org.persona.middleware.context
Class ContextSubscriber

java.lang.Object
  org.persona.middleware.context.ContextSubscriber
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.BusMember, de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Caller, de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Subscriber
public abstract class ContextSubscriber
extends Object
implements de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Subscriber

Provides the interface to be implemented by context subscribers together with shared code. Only instances of this class can subscribe for context events. The convention of the context bus regarding the registration parameters is the following:

  • ContextPublishers provide only at the registration time info about themselves using ContextProvider.
  • ContextSubscribers may pass an array of ContextEventPatterns as their initial subscriptions and can always add new (and remove old) subscriptions dynamically.

Author:
mtazari
